articles.content:
Russian Ambassador hosts friendly gathering 
    Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Karlov hosted a friendly gathering at the embassy on Wednesday evening on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 92 (2003).
 Present at the gathering on invitation were Minister Paek Nam Sun and Vice-Minister Kung Sok Ung of Foreign Affairs and officials concerned.    
 Speeches were made there.

Rare owl caught in Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Rare owl caught in Mt. Paektu
    Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Builders of the revolutionary battle sites and historic sites in the Mt. Paektu area caught a rare owl on December 15 last year. 
 According to experts, it is strix uralensis pallas belonging to strigidae.    
 It, seven or eight years old, is 51 centimeters long and each wing is 30 centimeters long. The weight of the bird is 680 grams.

articles.title: Greetings to IDPS chairwoman
articles.content:
Greetings to IDPS chairwoman
    Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea today sent a message of greetings to Megawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of its foundation.
 The message said that the IDPS has made energetic efforts to achieve the territorial integrity of the country and national unity under the leadership of the chairwoman.    
 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, the message wished the chairwoman greater success in her work to strengthen the party.

articles.title: Congratulations to Slovenian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Slovenian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Anton Rop upon his appointment as Prime Minister of Slovenia.
 Expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished the prime minister great success in his responsible work for the economic development of the country.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop meets with new Indonesian Ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop meets with new Indonesian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Hendrati Sukendar Munthe, new Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
